channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
I need help very badly.. my server is suffering beacuse this dude I ip banned for advertising, bad language, etc..
now hes messing up my server by doing this...
when i open up server.whatever that black box that shows when people log on, do commands and yell and such..
it says this...
ClientHandler: Accepted from **.***.**.**:****
and he does that about 50 times and on ::players it shows like 50 nulls from him and laggs server and soon server holds to much and crashes..
PLEASE HELP ME
Thank you,
RomeScape, King124

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Monkey wacko:

He is using a nuller or server crasher there ways to block server crashers but nullers are almost impossible to block!

Decompile an AZN and find out what’s sending those nulls. Makes the fix obvious.

Read full topic
